s.text: And it would "radically alter the nature of the architecture of the business by shrinking the number of global competitors from"--can you stand it?
According to the dailies, the boy, Kipland Kinkel, shot up the school cafeteria with a rifle and two pistols, killing one student and wounding twenty-six.
Ever wonder if congressional staffers help their bosses write their newspaper submissions?
The details of the Oregon shootings are, in the words of the WP , "disturbingly familiar": a kid well-known for trouble acts out prior threats via his access to tremendous firepower.
